analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/20/0x7e04a8c9b52f3698b3d4f660254b06ff904b48ae.sol:
	Contract UZEEToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/20/0x7e04a8c9b52f3698b3d4f660254b06ff904b48ae.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x7e04a8c9b52f3698b3d4f660254b06ff904b48ae.sol:
